channel.title: Megaupload vs Joe Biden & Co
channel.description:
I'm not even going to voice my opinion on who's right or wrong in this matter. TorrentFreak – 8 Aug 12

Video: Police Raid On The Mansion Of Megaupload's Kim Dotcom - TorrentFreak

For more than six months there have been claims and counterclaims about what happened in January when New Zealand police raided the mansion of Megaupload founder Kim Dotcom. Now video of the event has been released to the public and it includes...
